channel.title: Black Berry-Scape V1
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/zsuz5x.png[/img]
[i][b]GUYS I ONLY POSTED THIS BECAUSE PPL ASKING IT FOR IT NOTHING ELSE!!![/b][/i]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/0d231fe83ea1c42e2c14eda18215b733/evolved%250000.png[/img]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/6b8c9459a1d39b66d1d96cb74d7e8822/evolved%250002.png[/img]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/e8446af8a2d76db8afc1ed7d6091b27d/evolved%250003.png[/img]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/d96efd5136076a706e98b4bbdd985715/evolved%250005.png[/img]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/fffb78e11f948c2d0c0182dffb19567a/evolved%250008.png[/img]
[IMG]http://fotopocket.nl/fpimages/2011/07/12/ba334d843994306b754aeb4f235f320a/evolved%250009.png[/img]
Welcome to my Black Berry-Scape Well i only post this source because ppl where asking me for it. Its just a edited allstar-scape v2 with
~ New Training teleport method ~ FULL anti SYIpkpker ~ FULL anti NULL ~ Commandslist added ~ Added automessage (easy to change) ~ Added many commands for more fun. ~ If a normal player trys to steal from the puppet at the staffzone, they will get auto banned if he is not staff! ~ Made new ::home2 (you can use if you prefer) ~ Made a ::funpk :D
Blackberry.freesmfhosting.com << My Forum >>
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=LLD17ENF][Click here to download the source!][/url]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=62OW05CH][Other Client downlaod link][/url] << heer a client if you want to use =)
~~ Black Berry ~~
